name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of September 21, students at Ningjin No. 13 Middle School in Xingtai, Hebei Province, were suspected of suffering from collective food poisoning. An insider said it was suspected to be because the roujiamo had gone bad.
The official response said that the food had been sealed on the spot and sent for inspection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 22, the official media reported the news that Chinese President Xi Jinping went to the Maple Bridge Experience Exhibition Hall in Shaoxing City, Zhejiang Province on the afternoon of September 20 under the title "Persisting in and developing the 'Maple Bridge Experience' in the new era".
The news pointed out that this year marks the 60th anniversary of Comrade Mao Zedong's instruction to study and promote the "Maple Bridge Experience" and the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Xi Jinping's instruction to persist in and develop the "Maple Bridge Experience".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 22, some netizens found that the toilet cabinets at Hangzhou Metro Sanba Station were sealed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 22, Zhu Jun withdrew the lawsuit, and the "Xian Zi case" ended.
The lawsuit experienced a narrative transformation from "sexual harassment" to "foreign forces trying to launch a color revolution in China through Metoo."
Over the past five years, this lawsuit has been part of the epitome of the transformation of our times.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @maishaotongxue Thank you for your hard work!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 23, it was reported online that a serious school bullying incident occurred at Pingcheng District Bilingual School in Datong, Shanxi Province. Two fourth-grade boys bullied and even sexually assaulted a boy in the same class for a long time.
The local police station said that multiple parties are currently coordinating and will announce the situation when it is available.
It is reported that the school class teacher accused the victim's parents of being dissatisfied with the matter and talking nonsense, which has caused a very bad impact on the school. He hopes that other parents will not spread the video of the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen added: Video of parents "making trouble" in school that the head teacher did not allow to be spread

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[What did the British say? ]
On September 22, the media released news that China refuted the UK's "Half-Yearly Report on Hong Kong Issues", and netizens demanded that the original text be released.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Parents questioned the bullying student why he let his child "lick his balls"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 23, the concert of the Japanese rock band Radwimps, which was originally scheduled to be held in Chongqing on September 22, was temporarily cancelled after a year of preparation.
There are rumors that the "limited day order" will begin soon.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 23, students of Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School organized a resistance because they were dissatisfied with the new principal's sudden announcement of a series of unreasonable regulations, including a ban on wearing shorts and skirts, mandatory morning exercises, and strict reduction of rest time. They posted a "Letter to All No. 1 Middle School Students" and a "Debate on Yan" against the principal offline and online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/SUsKnTN2rm

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Under a video about Zhong Nanshan, all the comments wished him a "good journey".
One netizen joked: "I feel relieved to see that everyone in the comment section is so sober. Thank you for taking care of us for so many years."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Tuition tutoring eventually evolved into "teacher education"]
Recently, the Ministry of Education's "Interim Measures for Administrative Punishment of Off-campus Training" will be implemented on October 15, and off-campus training institutions will no longer be able to continue tutoring.
Some institutions have changed their thinking and directly carried out parent education, giving parents tutoring, and then the parents go home to tutor their children, perfectly avoiding the risk of punishment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The incident further fermented
It was reported online that the person who posted the declaration at Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School was a student who was already studying at Peking University. He was currently being tracked down on the high-speed train returning to school
And former students of Zhengzhou No. 1 Middle School in various schools overseas posted the "Declaration" in their own schools to support their younger classmates.
